action.name: Download CSV
action.helpHtml: Downloads a grid or datastore as a .csv file.

property.name: Source control
property.getValuesFunction: return "<option value=''>Please select...</option>" + getControlOptions(this.gridId, null, "grid", true) + getControlOptions(this.gridId, null, "dataStore", true);
property.helpHtml: Select a grid or datastore control to produce a CSV file from.

property.name: Include columns
property.helpHtml: If supplied, filter to comma separated columns.

property.name: Output file name
property.helpHtml: Provide an output filename for the generated CSV file.
